mapper.select: SELECT cq.* FROM cardgame_question cq LEFT JOIN cardgame_submission cs ON cq.id = cs.question_id AND cs.user_id = #{user_id} AND cs.session_id = #{session_id} AND cs.is_correct = true WHERE cq.subject = #{subject} AND cs.question_id IS NULL ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 8
mapper.insert: insert into cardgame_submission (user_id, question_id, session_id, submitted_answer, is_correct, created_at) values (#{user_id}, #{question_id}, #{session_id}, #{submitted_answer}, #{is_correct}, now())
INSERT INTO cardgame_question (question, answer, subject, explanation_text, created_at) VALUES (#{question}, #{answer}, #{subject}, #{explanation_text}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cardgame_question WHERE subject = #{subject}
